properties.script:
from datetime import datetime, timedelta

# Get the current date and time
current_date = datetime.now()
new_date = current_date+timedelta(days=1)

# Print the results
print(new_date.strftime("%Y-%m-%d"))

from datetime import datetime, timedelta

# Get the current date and time
current_date = datetime.now()

# Calculate the dates
last_24_hours = current_date - timedelta(hours=24)

# Print the results
print(last_24_hours.strftime("%Y-%m-%d"))

from datetime import datetime, timedelta

# Get the current date and time
current_date = datetime.now()

# Calculate the dates
last_7_days = current_date - timedelta(days=7)
# Print the results
print(last_7_days.strftime("%Y-%m-%d"))

from datetime import datetime, timedelta

# Get the current date and time
current_date = datetime.now()

# Calculate the dates
last_30_days = current_date - timedelta(days=30)

# Print the results
print(last_30_days.strftime("%Y-%m-%d"))

def check_array(array):
    """
    Check if the array contains only zeros.
    Returns True if it contains any non-zero value, else False.
    """
    return any(value != 0 for value in array)

# Arrays to test
array_24hours = $activity.definition_activity_02IPZSQHKDILT37l4nQ3LZEuxUUcnV3KN2k.output.jsonpath_queries.runsOverTime_count-24Hours$
array_7Days = $activity.definition_activity_02IQ00P8OY0YH7Ps9ZbQmRR7XVkzFNeaAnD.output.jsonpath_queries.runsOverTime_count-7Days$
array_30Days = $activity.definition_activity_02IQ01CMOZ3JS4BZYdx7PqqTRD89qZHstew.output.jsonpath_queries.runsOverTime_count-30Days$

# List of arrays
arrays = [array_24hours, array_7Days, array_30Days]

# Determine overall test case result
if all(check_array(arr) for arr in arrays):
    print("Pass")
else:
    print("Fail")

    Returns True if it contains any non-zero value, else False.

# Arrays to test

array_7Days = $activity.definition_activity_02IQ0KG6YAIM76YkKHngQULviZzdZSxtUpS.output.jsonpath_queries.AvgRunsTime_count-7Days$
